title: Media - Highlights 2
custom_preconds: Given we have selected the Video menu

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN we have selected the Videos tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN all videos listed under the Highlights tab will be accurate, readable & display the correct icon

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN we scroll through the Videos list
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN we will briefly see a placeholder icon for each video before it's thumbnail loads

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN we have selected the Video tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the formatting of the text & thumbnails appears consistent

custom_steps_separated.content:
When we tap on the Class picker
And choose a particular class
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the videos will change the videos according the class that was chosen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user examines the contents of the video thumbnail
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the thumbnail will contain a title in white bolded font
AND the time/date stamp will be below the the title
AND a Share icon will be in the lower right-hand corner (if enabled)
AND all text present will be clear and legible

custom_steps_separated.content: When we tap on the information button on the top right hand corner of video thumbnail
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a brief description of the video will appear on the thumbnail
AND at the bottom the date of the video will appear

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user attempts to scroll down
AND the user attempts to scroll up
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the scrolling in either direction will be possible
AND the inertial scrolling will be smooth

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a video thumbnail is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video playback for the selected highlight will begin after pre-roll ad plays

custom_steps_separated.content: When a video thumbnail is tapped and user plays video and pre-roll ad appears and the user taps x
custom_steps_separated.expected: the user should be taken out of the video players

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN we have tapped on the class selector
AND we are examining the contents of the class index
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a cell for each of the classes will be present
AND the classes will be listed in this order: Triple-A,Double-A,Class A Advanced,Class A, Class A Short Season, and Rookie

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a video is being played
AND the user taps on these screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the video controller UI will appear onscreen
AND all button/controllers will perform their specified functions correctly

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has tapped on the Videos tab
AND Triple-A has been selected in the class selector
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN only Triple-A Video Highlights will display
Test for ALL classes

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on another view
AND the user presses the class selector on top center
AND Chooses Triple A
AND returns to the Video page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Double-A Video Highlights will no longer be present
AND only Triple-A Video Highlights will display
Test for ALL classes

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the value <keyword type="mmtax" value="shareable"/> of the following xml:

Prod: http://www.milb.com/gen/hb/video/mobile/${leagueOrClass}.xml
QA: http://qa.milb.com/gen/hb/video/mobile/${leagueOrClass}.xml

Example: http://www.milb.com/gen/hb/video/mobile/pacific-international.xml
Example: http://www.milb.com/gen/hb/video/mobile/double_a.xml
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video highlight share icon will be visible/not visible on a given highlight depending on the setting (both scenarios must be tested)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the share icon in the lower right corner of the thumbnail
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a menu will pop up
AND will contain a Tweet button
AND will contain a Post to Facebook button
AND will contain an Email a Link Button
AND will contain a Message button
AND will contain a Cancel button

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN Twitter account is not set on a device
AND the Tweet button is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the following error message will appear:

No Twitter Account
There are no Twitter accounts configured. You can add or create a Twitter account in Settings.

AND will contain an OK button that is tappable & will cause the error message to disappear when tapped

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the share arrow
AND Selects Tweet
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the tweet sheet should appear
AND the format should display the title of the video followed by Sent with MiLB First Pitch
AND the last line should be the actual link to the video, but it will only appear on the actual tweet, not the tweet sheet

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the device does not have a Facebook account setup
AND the Share button is tapped on video
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will not be able to see the Facebook icon listed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the Post to Facebook button is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Post to Wall page will open

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the share arrow
AND then taps on Post to Facebook
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Facebook Post to Wall page will appear
AND the actual post will display the video thumbnail & caption followed by milb.com

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the Email a Link button is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN device's native email client will open an email form

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the share button for a Video
AND selects the Email a Link button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the email draft will appear
AND be formatted with the video highlight title, the date & Sent with MiLB First Pitch

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the Message button is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the device message client will open

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the share arrow on the video
AND then taps on the Message button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a New Message screen will appear
AND once the message is sent it will be formatted with just a video link that will push on the wap site
